data.title: Plane carrying Brazilian football team missing in Colombia – reports
India unveils the world's largest solar power plant.
UK parliament passes Digital Economy Bill, forcing people to register if they want to watch porn and banning many sex acts
New £5 notes contain animal fat, Bank of England admits, causing outrage among vegetarians
Night vision devices provided by the United States to the Pakistani Army recovered from terrorists in Kashmir
Philippines President Duterte threatens to kill human rights activists critical of his drug war
Thousands of Nigerian fisherman sue Shell for destroying their communities
UK surveillance law receives Royal Assent. Tim Berners-Lee calls it a "security nightmare".
Scientists record biggest ever coral die-off on Australia's Great Barrier Reef
Prince Alwaleed bin Talal Says Saudi Women Should Drive
President Park Willing to Take Orderly Resignation
Dome installed over Chernobyl to prevent further fallout
Erdogan says " We entered Syria to end Assad's rule"
Canadian police to punish drunk drivers with Nickelback
Dutch parliament votes to ban burqas, niqabs in some public places
